title: PS VR 2 Reviews are in! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.16.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Blessing and Tim talk PlayStation VR 2 reviews, Horizon Call of The Mountain, and that hot new Tetris movie trailer.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:25 - Housekeeping
Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames is popping off right now. Over there we have a Wild Hearts review for this week’s Kinda Funny Gamescast and our PS VR 2 + Horizon Call of The Mountain review on PS I Love You XOXO.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:37 - PSVR 2 Reviews Are In, review round up
00:24:17 - Horizon Call of The Mountain review round up
00:28:38 - Ad
00:30:46 - Wild Hearts Review Round up
00:35:18 - Ubisoft says it will attend E3 2023 ‘if it happens’
00:43:18 - Apple TV+ is releasing a Tetris movie
00:47:45 - Crystal Dynamics and Eidos Montreal are expected to release 5 triple-A games by March 2028
00:52:00 - Out today
00:54:24 - You‘re Wrong
